docs.snippet: Candidates for weekend elections in Central African Republic wrapped up campaigning on Friday with promises to put an end to years of religious and ethnic bloodshed in the impoverished nation....
docs.lead_paragraph: Candidates for weekend elections in Central African Republic wrapped up campaigning on Friday with promises to put an end to years of religious and ethnic bloodshed in the impoverished nation.

headline.main: Candidates Promise Peace Ahead of Central African Elections
headline.print_headline: Candidates Promise Peace Ahead of Central African Elections

docs.snippet: At a campaign rally in a north Indian city, a visibly drunk election worker from Prime Minister Narendra Modi's nationalist party climbs unsteadily onto the stage after being called to speak....
docs.lead_paragraph: At a campaign rally in a north Indian city, a visibly drunk election worker from Prime Minister Narendra Modi's nationalist party climbs unsteadily onto the stage after being called to speak.

headline.main: Divisive Politics Return as India's Modi Eyes Make-Or-Break State Vote
headline.print_headline: Divisive Politics Return as India's Modi Eyes Make-Or-Break State Vote

docs.snippet: Rocked by scandal, Mr. Zuma gave a state of the nation address more humbled than he has ever been. The opposition took the chance to demand his resignation....
docs.lead_paragraph: Rocked by scandal, Mr. Zuma gave a state of the nation address more humbled than he has ever been. The opposition took the chance to demand his resignation.
docs.abstract: South African president Jacob G Zuma faces intense heckling and calls for his resignation from political opposition while delivering state of the nation address; adopts solemn tone for crucial speech  aimed at restoring confidence in his administration, addressing country's floundering economy and allegations of misconduct.

headline.main: Rivals Disrupt Jacob Zuma’s Speech on South African Economy
headline.print_headline: Humbled and Heckled, Zuma Addresses Nation
